name: Discharge/End Visit
description: Signals the end of a patient's stay in a healthcare facility, changing patient status to discharged
businessPurpose: Notify receiving applications that a patient's encounter has ended and discharge processing has been completed
timing: Sent when discharge orders are processed and patient status changes to discharged
realWorldScenarios: Discharge to another acute care facility

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - discharge information impacts billing and follow-up care
